articles.title: Iranian Infy APT Resurfaces with New Malware Activity After Years of Silence
articles.summary:

articles.title: RansomHouse upgrades encryption with multi-layered data processing
articles.summary: The RansomHouse ransomware-as-a-service (RaaS) has recently upgraded its encryptor, switching from a relatively simple single-phase linear technique to a more complex, multi-layered method. [...]

articles.summary:
